entry.title: Submit research
entry.body:
We are looking to expand our community research base for social entrepreneurship and are actively accepting research from universities, industry bodies and community partners alike. We accept different types of evidence-based research including articles, publications, tools and more.

How it works

  • Read our research guidelines
  • Complete the submission form
  • We will review your submission and may get back to you with further questions
  • Once approved we will post your research on the directory
